text:
Official Program
SEVENTEENTH INSTITUTE FOR
EDUCATION BY RADIO
FOUNDED 1930
Under the auspices of
THE OHIO STATE UNIVERSITY
in Cooperation with
Columbus Radio Stations
DESHLER-WALLICK HOTEL
COLUMBUS, OHIO
MAY 2-5, 1947
The Annual Meeting of the Institute is open to all interested persons upon payment
of registration fee. You are cordially invited to attend.
